name: Cyberpunch (TirNaDigiteach)
description:
Cyberpunch is a retro-techno themed 2D platform fighting game. It's a brawler inspired by Smash bros and other fighting games. The entire game is themed around music and neon lights. The game supports both local and networked multiplayer.

Winner of Best game built with software libraries at Games Fleadh Ireland 2019.

Programmed by :

Daryl Keogh, David O'Gorman, Zachary Jacques, and James Pierce.

Art assets by :

Emma Burel, and Robert O'Connor
